description: snow-covered village, trees, and bridge seen from a distance, with only green beneath snow; calm water with three boats in URQ; birds flying in sky; brilliant orange thin clouds; sun at horizon line center; dark blue sky at top; brown patterned border
dimension:
9 5/8 × 15 1/8 in. (24.4 × 38.4 cm) (sheet) vertical ōban
13 × 20 in. (33 × 50.8 cm) (mount)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Places in the Eastern Capital (Tōto meisho 東都名所)
title: Snow on New Year's Day at Susaki
